0x00000000.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 0
0x00000000.name: Target0AddressModeCfg

0x00000004.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 1
0x00000004.name: Target1AddressModeCfg

0x00000008.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 2
0x00000008.name: Target2AddressModeCfg

0x0000000c.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 3
0x0000000c.name: Target3AddressModeCfg

0x00000010.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 4
0x00000010.name: Target4AddressModeCfg

0x00000014.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 5
0x00000014.name: Target5AddressModeCfg

0x00000018.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 6
0x00000018.name: Target6AddressModeCfg

0x0000001c.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 7
0x0000001c.name: Target7AddressModeCfg

0x00000020.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 8
0x00000020.name: Target8AddressModeCfg

0x00000024.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 9
0x00000024.name: Target9AddressModeCfg

0x00000028.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 10
0x00000028.name: Target10AddressModeCfg

0x0000002c.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 11
0x0000002c.name: Target11AddressModeCfg

0x00000030.description: Configuration CSR for programming the addressing mode for Target ID 12
0x00000030.name: Target12AddressModeCfg

0x00000034.name: Target13AddressModeCfg

fields.description: The specific NN chain (A/B schemes) used for linking all the MEs within the Island
fields.name: NNchainCfg

fields.description: Broadcast mode for parallel loading of the Control Store in all MEs within an Island (both ME and SM Islands)
fields.name: BroadcastMode

fields.description: The specific translation mode to be used by the IMB when generating the Island number where the Target resides
fields.name: Mode

fields.description: The specific addressing mode (32 or 40) used by the Master when referencing the Target
fields.name: AddrMode

fields.description: The actual Island number for Island 1
fields.name: Island1

fields.description: The actual Island number for Island 0
fields.name: Island0
